com.yubico.bitcoin.soft

Class YkneoBitcoinSoft

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yubico.bitcoin.soft.YkneoBitcoinSoft
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    YkneoBitcoin

    public class YkneoBitcoinSoft
extends Object
implements YkneoBitcoin
    This is a software implementation of YkneoBitcoin which is meant to be used for testing purposed only! It will allow you to test interop with YkneoBitcoin without requiring a physical YubiKey NEO with the applet.

      byte[] exportExtendedPublicKey()
      Exports the stored extended public key which can be used for the creation of read-only wallets.

    • Method Detail

      • exportExtendedPublicKey

        public byte[] exportExtendedPublicKey()
                               throws PinModeLockedException,
                                      IOException,
                                      OperationNotPermittedException,
                                      NoKeyLoadedException
        Description copied from interface: YkneoBitcoin
        Exports the stored extended public key which can be used for the creation of read-only wallets. Unless the allowExport flag was set when the key was generated or imported, this method will fail. Requires admin mode to be unlocked.
        Specified by:
        exportExtendedPublicKey in interface YkneoBitcoin
        Returns:
        A BIP 32 formatted extended public key.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        IOException
        OperationNotPermittedException
        NoKeyLoadedException

      • getAppletVersion

        public byte[] getAppletVersion()
        Description copied from interface: YkneoBitcoin
        Gets the version of the ykneo-bitcoin applet that is loaded on the YubiKey NEO as a 3 byte array. The contained bytes represent the major, minor and micro versions of the applet.
        Specified by:
        getAppletVersion in interface YkneoBitcoin
        Returns:
        The ykneo-bitcoin applet version.

      • unlockUser

        public void unlockUser(String pin)
                throws IncorrectPINException,
                       IOException
        Description copied from interface: YkneoBitcoin
        Unlocks user mode of operation. If the incorrect PIN is given too many times, the mode will be locked.
        Specified by:
        unlockUser in interface YkneoBitcoin
        Parameters:
        pin - The PIN code to unlock user mode.
        Throws:
        IncorrectPINException
        IOException

      • setUserPin

        public void setUserPin(String oldPin,
              String newPin)
                throws IncorrectPINException,
                       IOException
        Description copied from interface: YkneoBitcoin
        Changes the user PIN. Does not require user mode to be unlocked. After successfully setting the PIN, the mode will be locked.
        Specified by:
        setUserPin in interface YkneoBitcoin
        Parameters:
        oldPin - The current user PIN.
        newPin - The new user PIN to set.
        Throws:
        IncorrectPINException
        IOException

        newPin - The new admin PIN to set.

      • resetUserPin

        public void resetUserPin(String newPin)
                  throws PinModeLockedException,
                         IOException
        Description copied from interface: YkneoBitcoin
        Re-sets and unblocks the user PIN. Can be used if the user PIN is lost. Requires admin mode to be unlocked.
        Specified by:
        resetUserPin in interface YkneoBitcoin
        Parameters:
        newPin - The new user PIN to set.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        IOException

      • getHeader

        public byte[] getHeader()
                 throws PinModeLockedException,
                        IOException,
                        NoKeyLoadedException
        Description copied from interface: YkneoBitcoin
        Gets the 13 byte BIP 32 key header for the stored extended private key.
        Specified by:
        getHeader in interface YkneoBitcoin
        Returns:
        version(4) | depth(4) | parents fingerprint(4) | child number(4)
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        IOException
        NoKeyLoadedException

      • getPublicKey

        public byte[] getPublicKey(boolean compress,
                  int... index)
                    throws PinModeLockedException,
                           UnusableIndexException,
                           IOException,
                           NoKeyLoadedException
        Description copied from interface: YkneoBitcoin
        Gets the public key obtained by deriving a sub key from the master key pair using the given index. Requires user mode to be unlocked.
        Specified by:
        getPublicKey in interface YkneoBitcoin
        Parameters:
        compress - True to return a compressed public key, false to return the uncompressed public key.
        index - The index of the derived sub key to get.
        Returns:
        A 65 (uncompressed) or 33 (compressed) byte public key.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        UnusableIndexException
        IOException
        NoKeyLoadedException

      • sign

        public byte[] sign(byte[] hash,
          int... index)
            throws PinModeLockedException,
                   UnusableIndexException,
                   IOException,
                   NoKeyLoadedException
        Description copied from interface: YkneoBitcoin
        Signs the given hash using the private key obtained by deriving a sub key from the master key pair using the given index. Requires user mode to be unlocked.
        Specified by:
        sign in interface YkneoBitcoin
        Parameters:
        hash - The 32 byte hash to sign.
        index - The index of the derived sub key to sign with.
        Returns:
        A digital signature.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        UnusableIndexException
        IOException
        NoKeyLoadedException

      • generateMasterKeyPair

        public byte[] generateMasterKeyPair(boolean allowExport,
                           boolean returnPrivateKey,
                           boolean testnetKey)
                             throws PinModeLockedException,
                                    IOException
        Description copied from interface: YkneoBitcoin
        Generates a new master key pair randomly, overwriting any existing key pair stored on the device. The allowExport flag determines if the extended public key can later be exported or not. The returnPrivateKey flag determines if the generated key should be returned from the device (for backup purposes) or not. Requires admin mode to be unlocked.
        Specified by:
        generateMasterKeyPair in interface YkneoBitcoin
        Parameters:
        allowExport - Sets the allowExport flag permitting the extended public key to be exported.
        returnPrivateKey - When true, the generated extended private key is returned, when false, an empty byte[] is returned.
        testnetKey - When true, the generated key will be for testnet use.
        Returns:
        A BIP 32 formatted extended private key, if returnPrivateKey is set.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        IOException

      • importExtendedKeyPair

        public void importExtendedKeyPair(byte[] extendedPrivateKey,
                         boolean allowExport)
                           throws PinModeLockedException,
                                  IOException
        Description copied from interface: YkneoBitcoin
        Imports a new extended key pair, overwriting any existing key pair stored on the device. The allowExport flag determines if the extended public key can later be exported or not. Requires admin mode to be unlocked.
        Specified by:
        importExtendedKeyPair in interface YkneoBitcoin
        Parameters:
        extendedPrivateKey - A BIP 32 formatted extended private key to be imported.
        allowExport - Sets the allowExport flag permitting the extended public key to be exported.
        Throws:
        PinModeLockedException
        IOException
